General.Name: Tianjin Guangyu Development Co Ltd
General.Description: China Green Electricity Investment of Tianjin Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, construction, and operation of offshore and onshore wind power, photovoltaic, and solar thermal power generation projects in China. It also provides energy storage services. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Guangyu Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Green Electricity Investment of Tianjin Co., Ltd. in September 2022. China Green Electricity Investment of Tianjin Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Beijing, China. China Green Electricity Investment of Tianjin Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Luneng Group Co.,LTD.

1.Name: Mr. Kunjie  Zhang
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
